description: Remain sensitive to circumstances and surroundings to effectively connect with people: PM to IAS Officers Add value to the working of the Departments you are attached with: PM Modi Do not to be over
caption: nm-4.com
message:
Interacted with IAS officers of the 2014 batch. Urged them to remain sensitive to the circumstances & surroundings to serve people better. 

Urged officers to effectively put to practice the skills they learnt during training & use latest technology at work. 
http://nm-4.com/rovt
